Dear {!Lead.LastName} {!Lead.FirstName},
On behalf of the whole team here at TECOM, I would like to extend a warm welcome to our communities. We have prepared an interactive welcome pack as per the attached to support your transition to TECOM. It has been designed to provide important details related to day-to-day life in and around TECOM. If you would like me to come to your office and walk through it with your team, please let me know as I would be happy to do so.
Best Regards,
{!Lead.OwnerFullName} Partner Relations Manager M: {!Lead.OwnerPhone} T: +971 4 433 3000 PO Box: 333 300 www.tecom.com
A MEMBER OF TECOM GROUP
